sorular.soru: Who is/are allowed to go before you?

feedback.metin: The moped rider and the cyclist are riding on a priority road. Sign B-6 and the priority triangles indicate that you must give way to the drivers on the intersecting road. The moped rider and the cyclist may therefore both go before you. The pedestrian is walking straight ahead on the same road you want to turn off from. Through traffic goes before traffic turning off. The pedestrian may therefore also go before you.

sorular.soru: What information can be found on the registration card?
cevaplar: Details regarding the insurance of the vehicle.
Details regarding the periodic general inspection (APK).
Details regarding the owner or holder of the vehicle.
dogruCevap: Details regarding the owner or holder of the vehicle.

feedback.metin: On the vehicle registration card you can find details regarding the owner or holder of the vehicle, and details about the vehicle itself. For instance, colour, cylinder capacity, fuel type and maximum weight. Details about the periodic general inspection (APK) can be found on the inspection certificate. Details about the insurance can be found on the insurance card.
